pr_title: [1340] Added check for duplicate configuration ports.

timeline.message:
[1340] Added check for duplicate configuration ports.

Signed-off-by: Mark Terry <mark.terry@consensys.net>

timeline.body:
Looks like we need to special case port zero, which is designed to conflict.
```suggestion
              if (port != 0 && !allocatedPorts.add(port)) {
```
We will also need a unit test for this.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Looks like we need to special case port zero, which is designed to conflict.

Suggested change
if (!allocatedPorts.add(port)) {
if (port != 0 && !allocatedPorts.add(port)) {

We will also need a unit test for this.
